tool_description: Translate text to 100+ languages ​. Fast processing, cost saving. Free up to 100,000 characters per month
name: Text Translator_v2
title: Text Translator

api_list.name: getLanguages
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get a list of available language codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translator2.p.rapidapi.com/getLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translator2.p.rapidapi.com/getLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
